data.title: Radio broadcast update – September 2023
data.meta_description: A round-up of Ofcom’s broadcast radio licensing activity in September 2023.
data.text:
A round-up of Ofcom’s broadcast radio licensing activity in September 2023.

Digital Radio

Analogue Commercial Radio

Analogue Community Radio

Digital Radio

National DAB multiplex variations

The following national radio multiplex variations were agreed during this period:

ChangeMultiplexAddition of Heart Xmas (temporary service)

Digital One

Addition of Absolute Classic Rock; Absolute Radio Country; Heat Radio; Kerrang! Radio; Magic at the Musicals; Magic Chilled; Magic Soul.Sound DigitalRemoval of Fun KidsSound Digital

Small-scale DAB multiplex licence awards

The following small-scale radio multiplex licence awards were made during this period:

Licence areaSuccessful applicant companyAlnwick and Morpeth (re-advertisement)Northumberland Community Digital CICIsle of Scilly (re-advertisement)Saltito Media LimitedMerthyr and Rhondda Cynon Taf (re-advertisement)GTFM (South Wales) Limited

Small-scale DAB: Announcement of Round Six licence areas

Ofcom is today announcing the 27 areas that we plan to advertise small-scale radio multiplex licences for in the sixth round of small-scale DAB multiplex licensing next year. They are as follows:

Ayr, Troon and Irvine

Barrow-in-Furness

Bournemouth and Boscombe

Bridgend

Carlisle and Penrith

Catterick, Rippon and Thirsk

Corby and Kettering

Workington and Whitehaven

Yeovil

Analogue Commercial Radio

AreaService nameCurrent LicenseeNorth Wales CoastCapitalMarcher Radio Group Limited

AreaService nameCurrent LicenseeGreater LondonHeartGlobal Radio London LimitedLeicesterCapitalLeicester Sound Ltd

Local radio licence transfers

Ofcom has approved the transfer of the following local commercial licences:

AreaService namePrevious LicenseeNew LicenseeOxford/South OxfordshireJack FMJack Media Oxfordshire LimitedBauer Media Audio Limited acting as a general partner for Bauer Media Audio LPOxfordJack 2Jack Media Oxfordshire LimitedBauer Media Audio Limited acting as a general partner for Bauer Media Audio LP

Analogue station Format Changes

During the last month the services listed below have requested an amendment to their technical arrangements. The application(s) are published on the commercial radio amendments page of our website. Ofcom will accept representations up to one month following publication before we make a formal decision. Representations can be sent to broadcast.licensing@ofcom.org.uk

Service nameLocationSunshine RadioLudlow and South Shropshire
